Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Udar
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A dedicated artillery unit, the Udar is a long-range siege weapon that can be operated by a two-man crew for faster loading speeds. Small and inefficient fuel reserves are its limiting factor, as it can drive through any terrain without issue.

A priority target and defenseless by itself or in close range, especially with its thin rear plating, a well-defended Udar can lay down quick barrages of mortar shells and reposition out of danger.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
